label: gcli: create handler [user]
args: cd $ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT && go build -o /tmp/gcli-debug . && cd debug && /tmp/gcli-debug create handler user

label: gcli: create service [user]
args: cd $ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT && go build -o /tmp/gcli-debug . && cd debug && /tmp/gcli-debug create service user

label: gcli: create repository [user]
args: cd $ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT && go build -o /tmp/gcli-debug . && cd debug && /tmp/gcli-debug create repository user

label: gcli: create model [user]
args: cd $ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT && go build -o /tmp/gcli-debug . && cd debug && /tmp/gcli-debug create model user

label: gcli: create all [user]
args: cd $ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT && go build -o /tmp/gcli-debug . && cd debug && /tmp/gcli-debug create all user

label: gcli: debug (dlv :2345) create handler [user]
args: cd $ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT && dlv debug --headless --listen=:2345 --api-version=2 --wd ./debug . -- create handler user
